Package de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.blockData

Class BlockStorage

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.blockData.BlockStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BlockStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A layer of abstraction between chunks and the underlying data structure which holds the data of blocks (materials) Supported are 3-dimensional arrays and octrees
Author:
Stefan Hofweber (WiSe 2018/19)
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public short getBlock​(int x, int y, int z)
      Returns the block id at a given position. The current format for arrays are local coordinates (0 - chunk size) The current format for octrees are global coordinates
